english.segment1: Theres no need to say a thing, When Im before you in this silence. I feel refreshed with peace. Break this noise that binds the voice. That tries speak open up my eyes to see. Your gracious sovereign reach
english.segment2: [CHORUS]. Its hard to talk when I feel that you are near, When all is quiet its the beauty that I hear, This hidden place where I know that you calm my fears. I know that youve washed my tears
english.segment3: The seasons of change Ive faced. Have never left me wounded. Only scars of hurt. But never deeply rooted. This healing I have felt. No burden can replace. Redemptive hope has been the story of my pain
english.segment4: All is lost without the breath of life you give. And you give so much. I want nothing more than you so heres my heart
